verses.verse: (For the choir director; on a stringed instrument. [A Psalm] of David.) Hear <S%H8085><s%> my cry, <S%H7440><s%> O God; <S%H430><s%> Give <S%H7181><s%> heed <S%H7181><s%> to my prayer. <S%H8605><s%>

From the end <S%H7097><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%> I call <S%H7121><s%> to Thee, when my heart <S%H3820><s%> is faint; <S%H5848><s%> Lead <S%H5148><s%> me to the rock <S%H6697><s%> that is higher <S%H7311><s%> than <S%H4480><s%> I.
For Thou hast been <S%H1961><s%> a refuge <S%H4268><s%> for me, A tower <S%H4026><s%> of strength <S%H5797><s%> against <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> the enemy. <S%H340><s%>
Let me dwell <S%H1481><s%> in Thy tent <S%H168><s%> forever; <S%H5769><s%> Let me take <S%H2620><s%> refuge <S%H2620><s%> in the shelter <S%H5643><s%> of Thy wings. <S%H3671><s%> Selah. <S%H5542><s%>
For Thou hast heard <S%H8085><s%> my vows, <S%H5088><s%> O God; <S%H430><s%> Thou hast given <S%H5414><s%> [me] the inheritance <S%H3425><s%> of those who fear <S%H3372><s%> Thy name. <S%H8034><s%>
Thou wilt prolong <S%H3254><s%> the king's life; <S%H3117><s%> His years <S%H8141><s%> will be as many <S%H1755><s%> generations. <S%H1755><s%>

He will abide <S%H3427><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> God <S%H430><s%> forever; <S%H5769><s%> Appoint <S%H4487><s%> lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%> and truth, <S%H571><s%> that they may preserve <S%H5341><s%> him.

So <S%H3651><s%> I will sing <S%H2167><s%> praise <S%H2167><s%> to Thy name <S%H8034><s%> forever, <S%H5703><s%> That I may pay <S%H9608><s%> my vows <S%H5088><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> by day. <S%H3117><s%>
